name: AVCON Jet Africa
about: Avcon Jet Africa, located at Grand Central Airport in Midrand, South Africa, is a premier flight school offering ab-initio and advanced flight training to students worldwide. As a specialist aviation consulting company, Avcon Jet Africa provides a comprehensive range of services including air charters, flight training, simulators, and aircraft sales. The school operates under high safety and training standards, adhering to EASA Commercial, FAA, and ICAO recommendations. With a team of well-educated and experienced professionals, Avcon Jet Africa ensures top-notch education and safety, making it an ideal choice for aspiring pilots. The school's commitment to excellence and customer care sets it apart in the aviation training industry.
